attributes.action: Recognise Somaliland as an independent state
attributes.additional_details: UK Government to formally recognise Somaliland as an independent state.
attributes.background:
Recognise Somaliland as an independent state
The right to self-determination appears to be applicable to Somaliland. We therefore want the UK Government to formally recognise Somaliland as an independent state.

rejection.details:
We currently have this petition open which you may wish to sign: 

'Recognise Somaliland as an independent state'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595177
